title: Arcade Poro Kart

embed.description: My entry for the Poro riot contest. I choose Arcade theme. Tumblr reblog : holyelfgirl.tumblr.com/post/10... Facebook : www.facebook.com/holyelfgirl

body: This is my entry for the poro creation contest: arcade poro kart !

2) I'm still improving my art >__< Thank you!
3) I'm working on new comics, be patience : ) Which champions would you like to see in future comics?

5) We both want to take care of our mates (I'd like to reply boobs...)

The Gentleman Poro's kart would look super stylish. ^_^  This sounds like an awesome idea for a future game mode.
